INIT,DISCOVER_TRY_REUSE,OldIPAvailable,OFFER,WAITREQUEST_REUSE
INIT,DISCOVER_TRY_REUSE,OldNotIPAvailable,NAK,FINAL
INIT,DISCOVER,NewIPAvailable,OFFER,WAITREQUEST
INIT,DISCOVER,NoIPAvailable,nooutput,FINAL
INIT,DISCOVER,Error,NAK,FINAL
WAITREQUEST_REUSE,REQUEST,OkReUse,ACK,IPAllocated

WAITREQUEST_REUSE,RELEASE,OkReleased,ACK,FINAL

WAITREQUEST,REQUEST,Enjoy,ACK,IPAllocated
WAITREQUEST,DECLINE,Sorry,ACK,FINAL
WAITREQUEST,tmo,Tmo1,nooutput,FINAL
IPAllocated,tmo,Tmo2,nooutput,FINAL

IPAllocated,INFORM,OK,INFORM,IPAllocated
